Interface MemcacheConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:

extends Configuration<MemcachePoolService>

    • Method Detail

      • expiration

        @Optional
Property<Integer> expiration()
        Cached items expiration in seconds. Defaulted to 3600 seconds, one hour.
        Returns:
        Cached items expiration configuration property

      • addresses

        @Optional
Property<String> addresses()
        Memcached server addresses space separated. Eg. "server1:11211 server2:11211". Defaulted to "127.0.0.1:11211".
        Returns:
        Memcached server addresses configuration property

      • protocol

        @Optional
Property<String> protocol()
        Memcache Protocol. Can be text or binary Defaulted to text.
        Returns:
        Memcache Protocol configuration property

      • username

        @Optional
Property<String> username()
        Username. Authentication happens only if set.
        Returns:
        Username configuration property

      • password

        @Optional
Property<String> password()
        Password.
        Returns:
        Password configuration property

      • authMechanism

        @Optional
Property<String> authMechanism()
        SASL authentication mechanism. Defaulted to PLAIN.
        Returns:
        Authentication mechanism configuration property
